abstract: The deal for Rohm & Haas will create one of the nation’s largest specialty chemical companies.
snippet: The deal for Rohm & Haas will create one of the nation’s largest specialty chemical companies.
lead_paragraph: Dow Chemical said Thursday that it had agreed to buy Rohm & Haas, a specialty chemical maker, for about $15.3 billion in cash.

headline.main: Dow Chemical Buying a Rival for $15.3 Billion
headline.print_headline: Dow Chemical Buys Rival for $15.3 Billion
